Two Types of NMDA-Receptor Mediated Neurotoxicity
Two Types of NMDA-Receptor
Mediated Neurotoxicity

Neuroapoptotic Degeneration
Neuroapoptotic
Degeneration

Developing brain
Developing brain

Excitotoxic Degeneration
Excitotoxic
Degeneration

Adult brain
Adult brain

Cell death without necrosis
Cell death without necrosis

Neuronal vacuoles and eventual necrosis
Neuronal vacuoles and
eventual necrosis

Widespread in brain
Widespread in brain

Distinct brain regions
Distinct brain regions

Can be physiological (example: synaptogenesis)
Can be physiological
(example: synaptogenesis)

Always pathological (example: ischemia)
Always pathological
(example: ischemia)
